languages.text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者在远程攻击之后进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，近战攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会受到-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会立刻陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者在远程攻击之后进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，近战攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会受到-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会立刻陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

每当装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击之后进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，近战攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，此次检定会受到−15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会立刻陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает дистанционную атаку, а сразу после нее {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, цель атаки вблизи выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж следом за {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, цель атаки вблизи выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.

Когда персонаж следом за {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, цель атаки вблизи выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.

languages.text: 自身が遠距離攻撃の後に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}をする度、近接攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−15で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しないと{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃の後に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}をする度、近接攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}-15で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。

自身が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃の後に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}をする度、近接攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−15で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} después de un ataque a distancia, el objetivo del ataque cuerpo a cuerpo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} después de un ataque a distancia, el objetivo del ataque cuerpo a cuerpo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.

Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} después de un ataque a distancia, el objetivo del ataque cuerpo a cuerpo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.

languages.text: Führt der Träger nach einem Fernkampfangriff einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -15 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Führt der Träger nach einem Fernkampfangriff einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -15 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} après une attaque à distance, la cible de l'attaque de mêlée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −15, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} après une attaque à distance, la cible de l'attaque de mêlée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −15, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi menzilli bir saldırının ardından {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde yakın dövüş saldırısının hedefi, −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç{/g} testinden geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
